entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS0234 'Http' does not exist in the namespace 'System.Net' when targeting .NET Fx 4.x with implicit usings #24146
  • dotnet tool install error installing when a private feed is in nuget.config #24140

Closed

  • Hot Reload make Linq Expressions code to fail with cached (static) reflection #23736
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Draft: detect if a particular execution of the SDK is on a CI system or not #24166
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 3.1.418 #24159
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.202 #24157
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.104 #24156
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 5.0.407 #24155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 5.0.213 #24154
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add default file inclusion support in .NET SDK for RESW and image files in WinAppSDK .NET projects. #24139
    Area-WebSDK

Updated

  • Pin the compiler version in RSG to an exact version #24130
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Blame switch args should not swallow following arg #23722
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet
